description: All your favourite things about a big bowl of ramen are right here, including cabbage, noodles, carrot and a sesame-chilli flavour to boot.
name: Ramen Spring Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place aioli in a small bowl. Swirl with sweet chilli sauce. Serve spring rolls with aioli mixture.
